author: coheigea
msg: Some changes to how Validators are used
- The processors do not now set default Validators, if the RequestData does not supply a Validator instance, then no validation is done
- Added a tag to WSSecurityEngineResult to indicate whether the token was validated or not
- Added support for the use-case of a Signature KeyInfo pointing to a BinarySecurityToken, which has been validated by a custom validator. Trust verification will pass for this case.

author: mxmanghi
msg: changed background color in rivet namespace table. Small improvements in request.xml

author: stsp
msg: (svn_cmdline_fputs, svn_cmdline_fflush): Don't needlessly create an error
and destroy it. For portability, use apr_get_os_error() instead of
